title: Animoca, Solv to help Japanese Bitcoin companies generate yield
contentSnippet: Solv generates Bitcoin yield through lending markets, liquidity provisioning to automated market maker pools, and participation in structured staking programs.

title: Connecticut can’t take action against Kalshi for now, judge rules
contentSnippet: A US judge has handed Kalshi a small win after putting a temporary stop to the Connecticut Department of Consumer Protection’s enforcement action against the company.

title: XRP Sell Pressure Emerges as Ripple Linked Token Fails to Sustain $2.12 Break
contentSnippet: Despite briefly reaching $2.17, XRP failed to maintain momentum, suggesting large holders may be unwinding positions rather than accumulating.

title: SEC委員長、2026年に仮想通貨規制の大幅進展を予告　トークン分類制度など導入加速
contentSnippet: SEC委員長が2026年の仮想通貨規制大幅進展を予告。トークン分類制度で3カテゴリーを非証券化、1月にイノベーション免除導入へ。前政権の法執行重視から明確なルール制定へ転換。

title: Breakout or Bull Trap? DOGE Jumps Above Resistance on Ethereum Strength
contentSnippet: Despite the breakout, DOGE faces significant structural resistance from major EMAs.

title: Binance Co-CEO Yi He’s WeChat Account Hacked to Push Meme Coin MUBARA
contentSnippet: The attackers profited by selling the memecoin after creating artificial demand through the false endorsement.

title: Rep. Keith Self Moves to 'Fix the Bill' With CBDC Ban Before Key Hearing
contentSnippet: The amendment follows Republican outcry over broken commitments to ban central bank digital currencies in the defense bill.

title: BTC, ETH, SOL, ADA Pull Back Ahead of Fed Meeting Where Rate-Cuts Expected
contentSnippet: Market depth in smaller tokens remained thin, echoing the uneven liquidity that has characterized December trading so far.

title: 著名投資家レイ・ダリオ「中東は資本家のシリコンバレー」：国家によるAI・デジタル資産戦略を絶賛
contentSnippet: 著名投資家レイ・ダリオ氏がAIのハブとして急速に成長する中東を高く評価し、「資本家のためのシリコンバレーになりつつある」と述べた。一方、マイケル・セイラー氏は中東がビットコイン担保型デジタル銀行システムによって「21世紀のスイス」になる可能性を指摘した。

title: Solana Liquidity Plummets to Bear Level Territory Amid $500M Liquidation Overhang
contentSnippet: On-chain data shows Solana's liquidity has contracted to bear-market levels, with $500M in long positions at risk if its price drops 5.5%.

title: Make crypto games great again? ‘Trump Billionaires Club’ launches this month
contentSnippet: The Trump Billionaires Club demo video on its website appears to feature a digital version of New York, showing a player token using dice rolls to move around a gameboard.

title: Bitcoin FOMO trickles back at $94K, but Fed could spoil the party
contentSnippet: Bitcoin surged to $94,625, its highest in three weeks, as positive social sentiment returned, but comments from the Fed on Wednesday could put it back on shaky ground.

title: Trump to begin interviews with Fed chair finalists this week: FT
contentSnippet: Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent has presented four names to the White House, with the list reportedly including former Fed governor Kevin Warsh and frontrunner Kevin Hassett.

title: Bitcoin firm Twenty One Capital drops 20% on first day of trading
contentSnippet: Twenty One Capital came to market with over $4 billion in Bitcoin, but its lack of publicly shared business plans appears to have led some investors to the exit.

title: Bitcoin Holds Near $92K as Selling Cools, but Demand Still Lags
contentSnippet: ETF inflows have finally turned positive, but weak on-chain activity, defensive derivatives positioning, and negative spot CVD show a market stabilizing without the conviction needed for a sustained m

title: AI Political Chatbots Can Sway Voters, New Research Finds
contentSnippet: The studies found policy-focused chatbot messages were more persuasive and that persuasion often rose alongside uneven inaccuracies.

title: 「ビットコイン・アフターダークETF」申請　夜間取引時間の高パフォーマンスに着目
contentSnippet: ニコラス・ウェルスが米国夜間取引時間のみ仮想通貨ビットコインを保有する新たなETFを申請した。夜間の高リターン傾向に注目したものだ。ヘッジ型ETFも同時申請した。

title: Teachers Union Urges Senate to Scrap Crypto Market Structure Bill
contentSnippet: The union urged lawmakers to abandon the draft, arguing it would erode securities protections and heighten risks for pension holders.

title: Vivek Ramaswamy’s Strive to raise $500M to buy Bitcoin
contentSnippet: Strive, co-founded in 2022 by American entrepreneur Vivek Ramaswamy, launched a $500 million preferred stock offering to acquire more Bitcoin and Bitcoin-related products.

title: Stripe’s stablecoin blockchain Tempo launches public testnet
contentSnippet: Public testnet for the Stripe-and-Paradigm-built payments blockchain is now live, featuring tools for developer onboarding and stablecoin testing.

title: プライバシー重視のステーブルコイン「USDCx」、Aleoのテストネットでローンチ
contentSnippet: 仮想通貨のステーブルコインUSDCを発行するサークルは、プライバシー機能を持つL1ブロックチェーンAleoのテストネットでUSDCxがローンチされたことを発表。ユースケースなどを説明した。

title: 仮想通貨市場は政策待ち姿勢　ビットコインとイーサリアムに資金集中＝Wintermute分析
contentSnippet: Wintermuteの最新市場分析によると、仮想通貨市場は米FRBや日銀の政策決定を前に様子見姿勢を強めている。資金はビットコインとイーサリアムに集中し、レバレッジ水平は低位。先週金曜の急落後も市場は底堅さを保ち、質への選別が進む。レンジ相場継続の見通し。

title: プライバシー重視ブロックチェーン「Octra」、30億円規模のICO実施へ
contentSnippet: 完全準同型暗号技術を採用する仮想通貨プロジェクト「Octra」が2000万ドル規模のトークンセールを実施する。これまでも分散化重視で資金調達を行ってきた。

title: Key U.S. Senator on Crypto Bill, Lummis, Negotiating Dicey Points With White House
contentSnippet: The Republican lawmaker who is among the core negotiators on the U.S. market structure bill said the White House has rejected some ethics language.

title: コインチェック、NACの新規取扱いを検討　NOT A HOTELとRWA領域で協業強化へ
contentSnippet: コインチェックがNOT A HOTEL DAOの暗号資産NACの取扱い検討とRWA領域の協業強化を発表。NACの活用や共同サービスの開発方針について解説します。

title: 「仮想通貨市場は次の10年間で最大20倍成長する可能性」Bitwise幹部が予測
contentSnippet: Bitwiseの最高投資責任者は、仮想通貨市場は次の10年間で10倍から20倍まで容易に成長する可能性があるとの見方を示した。ビットコインなどを例に挙げ、根拠を説明している。

title: US Tech Giants Unite to Battle China’s Open-Source AI Dominance
contentSnippet: Anthropic and OpenAI donate key protocols to Linux Foundation as China overtakes US in open-source AI downloads.

title: War Department Launches New Platform With Google’s Gemini in Military AI Push
contentSnippet: Google’s IL5-approved model has become the first generative AI deployed across the War Department as competition with China grows.

title: SEC Chair Atkins Says Many Types of Crypto ICOs Are Outside Agency’s Purview
contentSnippet: SEC Chair Paul Atkins described which types of token sales wouldn't qualify as securities offerings, responding to Decrypt's question.

title: Bitcoin 'After Dark' ETF Would Bet on BTC as Wall Street Sleeps
contentSnippet: The ETF would offer Bitcoin exposure when U.S. markets are closed.

title: Here’s what happened in crypto today
contentSnippet: Need to know what happened in crypto today? Here is the latest news on daily trends and events impacting Bitcoin price, blockchain, DeFi, NFTs, Web3 and crypto regulation.

title: Blockchain trial on Canton Network tests collateral reuse with tokenized US Treasurys
contentSnippet: The latest trial explored multiple stablecoins and showed tokenized US Treasurys can be reused instantly across counterparties on shared infrastructure.

title: Stripe's Tempo Payments Blockchain Opens to Public With Mastercard, UBS Onboard
contentSnippet: Tempo, the payments-focused blockchain from Stripe and Paradigm, is now open to the public following its global testnet launch.

title: Zcash Founder Zooko Wilcox Joins ZEC Treasury Firm as Privacy Coin Surges
contentSnippet: Cypherpunk Technologies stock jumped 40% Tuesday following the appointment of Zooko Wilcox to help guide the Zcash treasury firm.

title: Proposed ‘AfterDark’ Bitcoin ETF Would Skip U.S. Trading Hours
contentSnippet: The fund would hold bitcoin only overnight, betting on data showing bitcon gains mostly occur outside regular market hours.

title: XRP Underperforms Market as Sudden Bitcoin Surge Forces $387M of Liquidations
contentSnippet: XRP's technical outlook remains uncertain, with support at $2.05 and resistance at $2.17, as traders watch for volume expansion

title: Dogecoin Surges as Ether Zooms 8%, Sparking Bullish Reversal For Memecoins
contentSnippet: The breakout now sets up a clean continuation zone—provided bulls defend the mid-range pivot they just reclaimed.

title: Aptos Rises 8% After Breaking Through $1.80 Resistance
contentSnippet: Strong volume and technical momentum distinguished APT's gains from the broader market action.

title: リミックスポイント、エネルギー事業の中期経営計画を発表　3年で営業利益3.7倍目指す
contentSnippet: リミックスポイントが2027-2029年度の中期経営計画を発表。エネルギー・蓄電事業で売上高692億円、営業利益91億円を目指す。日本蓄電池と提携し系統用蓄電所7カ所を共同運営。同社は242億円超の仮想通貨も保有し、多角的な事業展開を推進。

title: 補正予算の国会質疑で仮想通貨税制が議題に　国民民主党が質問、高市首相は「与党税調で検討中」と答弁
contentSnippet: 補正予算の国会質疑で暗号資産（仮想通貨）税制が議題に。国民民主党は雑所得として最高税率55%が適用される現行制度を見直し、分離課税化を要求。高市首相は税制改正大綱に基づき与党税調で検討を進めていると答弁した。
